attributes.action: Give MP's a flat rate of pay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: no bill of rights,no constitutional reform,no code of conduct, no 16 year olds voting -  just give mp's a basic salary of £100,000 a year + £30,000 for office costs.nothing else,they can then spend it as they wish and we know what the final cost per year is.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
